text: so we were meeting weekly uh in the
evening for two hours and during these
two hours typically we had uh one part
which was dedicated more to the grammar
the structure of the language the
culture the Italian culture and one part
of the class during which we were
cooking and based on the dish that we
were cooking we were starting either
with the grammar or cooking for example
if we had to bake something we might
start baking and then while the cake was
baking we could discuss some grammar um
but there wasn't a very sharp division
many times I was really trying to um
melt the grammar part with the cooking
part and uh in each class we were
focusing on kitchen vocabulary so well I
prepared labels with the words of the
different ingredients of different
kitchen
wear so and this was helping us not only
to build the vocabulary but to practice
with the pronunciation because it can be
very challenging
